test.instr: (:ins (:task (putdown X) (:cond (color X yellow) (sort X can))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X green) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (color X green) (sort X can) (sort Y desk))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:cons_notnot (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X cupboard)))) )
test.nl: Put down the yellow can. Pick up the black bottle. Take out the remotecontrol which is green from the washmachine. Open the door of the microwave. Put the green can on the desk. The door of the closet is opened. The door of microwave is closed. There must be cupboard is opened.
